<<<<<<< HEAD
The tryall of true wisdom, with how to become wise indeed, or, A choice and cheap gift for a friend both to please and pleasure him, be he inferior or superior, sinful or faithful, ignorant or intelligent / By R. Younge ... ; add this as an appendix, or third part, to The hearts index, and, A short and sure way, to grace and salvation. Younge, Richard. Younge, Richard. Hearts-index, or, self-knowledg. Younge, Richard. Short and sure way to grace and salvation.
35 p.
J. Crump and H. Cripps, [London : 1658]
Caption title. Errata: p. 35. Imprint suggested by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints. Imperfect: faded, with print show-through. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library
=======
